caption: Great atmosphere and beer selections. Friendly staff and plenty of different seating options available. I would definitely want to come back. So glad it’s back and it’s open. Seriously love the food here and they have the best sour beers in town.

Delicious fried chicken sandwich. All white meat and most of all it was SUPER crispy and moist. Slaw could have been a bit more plentiful like the photos, and I didn't get the spicy option, but otherwise it went well with the pickles and …
my food was raw smh
Love this place! It's as good as the photos look! Staff is friendly, always great customer service. There's always an insane line out the door but it's definitely worth the wait.

Good selection of beer at a good price. Interesting food selections, but pricey and not done all that well. Westwood is sorely lacking any good gastropub/style so ill go back on occasion, but eveey time it leaves something to be desired.
Their burger is addictive!!!! 😍

Amazing experience here. Great beer selection with tasty IPAs, extremely beautiful indoor setup, really cool/pleasant bartenders, and Ellis is a very friendly/put-together manager. Food selection was on par with the rest, and they …
The ordering system sucked really bad. Never coming back. If you guys are so scared of taking my order then maybe you should close it down.
Nachos are so good! Great happy hour, $4 sculpin?  Count me in! Great bartenders, like terminator said "I'll be back".

Great service by Claudia, Serene and Jose... best drinks. We always order the appetizers and request specialty drinks from our favorite mixologist Claudia.  Depending on what mood you are and how you are feeling, Claudia will prepare a special delight for you.
I like

The only place in Westwood to get quality beer while simultaneously avoiding the college age crowd. Fantastic historic architecture elevates this brewery to greatness. Stop by here before you go see any play or movie and marvel at the beer, …
Wonderful recent addition to Westwood; great pub with superb fresh beers, excellent burgers, in the original building of Westwood itself (finished 1930). Welcoming staff, cool place to relax.

A modern, clean and stylish brewpub, stunning interior (I believe it’s a former bank building) in a nice part of town. Great beers and food and friendly staff. I’ve been twice now and I’m sure I’ll be back.

Went on a Sunday night. It was busier than usual due to Monday holiday. They were short staffed, but did a great job non the less. Food was amazing. Had burger and fries. One of the better burgers I’ve had. Food was hot. Came out quickly despite busy night. Had beer too. It was really good too. Would absolutely go again
Pretty good rotating selection of beers, and a nice atmosphere.  Definitely a positive addition for Westwood!

My mom ordered the chicken and she got it and it was very raw. We sent it back and 20 minutes later they came back, and they gave her a plate back, the same plate, with a bite out of the sweet potatoes and everything. So weird. And then she …

Delicious food and great beers. The beer selection constantly rotates so you’re always getting the freshest brews straight from the keg on draft.  You NEED to try the buttermilk fried chicken sandwich. Absolutely amazing. Make sure to ask …

All of their IPAs are phenomenal. 21 TVs is my favorite though - also great menu selection, lots of vegetarian and vegan options. The crack wings lived up to their name: sweet, a little spicy, and I needed more after I ate my order. Cocktails look great too, but I didn't try them. If you're on the fence, just go here ☺
Badass
Nice modern brew pub in historic building.

Does the staff get to taste the beer here?  Judging by the poor service, especially the male “beertender” who knows nothing about smiling or service, either they don’t or the beer is that bad.  Came in on a super light Monday lunchtime with …

Friendly staff, great everyday place in Westwood. Never had a bad meal, never feel ripped off by prices or portions (rare is West LA these days) & bustling but not overwhelming atmosphere. Great place to unwind!
(Translated by Google) No good  (Original) No Bueno

I was in LA for a few months this spring and I spent a ton of time here. The food is amazing, the beer is even better and the staff treat you like family. I travel all over the country and I haven't found a chicken sandwich that is even close to being as good as theirs was. I miss Broxton and can't wait to come back.
Their beer, food, service, location and historical building (incl beautiful patio) are top!  A fairytale place in the heart of Westwood.....I would easily give them 6 stars and more.
Got a refill and didn’t get it for the hike time and messed up my order 2 times
Highly recommend the pauley pale ale and chimichurri steak plate with broccolini
My wife and I constantly go here. We’re not big beer fans, but they have some of the best burgers around. The crazy wings are 100% worth getting ( and maybe should be it’s own meal option!)
Really nice restaurant / brewery. The atmosphere (particularly sat outdoors) was lovely and the food (I recommend the ribs) is great. Service was also very friendly.
Food was great! Not very good at making mixed drinks. Kept asking for Vodka drinks and they would put Gin.

Would highly recommend this place! Started a little rocky (waiting for service, out of some items), but they went out of their way to make up for it with excellent service and attention. The food was also fantastic and beer selection was great.

Excellent place overall. Terrific service. Really enjoyed the double impossible burger, the fries, the Buffalo cauliflower, and the beer. Lots of vegan and vegetarian options—including for brunch. Unfortunately they do run out of the …
Very mediocre fries and awfully little for $5  They also charge their 20% gratuity based on the post-tax amount -_-
Party of 7 and everyone's food was heavily over salted.
Food is fine, a little pricey outside happy hour for what you get. Service was pretty slow - took about 40 minutes after ordering to get burgers out
Such a great place to have good beer and food! Had a delicious spicy chicken burger and a super tasty beer flight! Service was great. Will be back for more, excellent experience overall
Great place great food ,good real ale ,great atmosphere
Cool place. Very well done!
Nice place good service and food. Try parking on street otherwise $10 parking is around. TV has sports on.
So worth it!!
Delicious food and friendly service!

The waiters Jeremy and Alex were great, especially Jeremy!  The food is interesting!  We had a couple appetizer's, hush puppies and ham >just basic, wouldn't order again; deviled eggs with crab> plain with a dab of crab on top, not getting …
Finally getting the crowd it deserves. They are finally making their own brews and they are killers, high ABV and tastey  as hell. Had the Smashburger w/fries, just what I needed.

Really, really good vegan options. Wide variety of interesting and tasty foods, including the scones with maple butter and ESPECIALLY the Broxton impossible burger.  Servers are all great, the housemade beer is tasty and refreshing, and the outside tables are open and sunny.  Check it out!

Solid spot for after work/school drinks and dinner. Great beer selection, perfectly capable bartenders, and tasty snacks. Plenty of TVs for catching a game,  free internet connection if you need to finish up some work, and a cool casual atmosphere for just hanging out. Great addition to Westwood.
Just had a delicious dinner, enjoyed tasty drinks, great atmosphere and yummy dessert at the Broxton. I love that this iconic Westwood Village building is alive and brings great energy to the area!
Great beer selection and staff. Open air feel, indoors. Will definitely return.
Thought Broxton Brewery was traffic . Good service , food ,drinks . My family was made countable there over a couple of needed hours .  Tad
LA needs more places like this.  Great location.  Great building.  Good, simple beer.
Kill the blinking lights up top and change the soundtrack. Otherwise super dope spot!

The menu is a bit limited but as they recently opened, I believe they re trying out different tastes and what really fits so it's understandable. Their veggie burger is amazing. Also, if you're alone or just two people, sit at the bar. It is definitely more enjoyable.

Excellent new brew pub that has moved into Westwood! Great beer, awesome environment, very delicious food and good service. Staff was friendly and helpful, and they have a great patio to hang out on if you've got a pupper alongside you with …

The food here was quite exceptional, the environment was open and airy, and all at a reasonable price. This place deserves to be in regular rotation for lunch with coworkers or a casual beer in the evenings.
Great new spot, very reasonable drink prices, fantastic ambiance and staff. Highly recommended.

Our server Rhiannon showed knowledge of the menu and assisted us well with our order. She was patient, fun, and clever. My food was tasty and the beer Red Barn was great. The only critique I had was the bar took awhile to get to us. But once the order was taken the drinks were quick.
Tony and thev ABC Crew do it again with this amazing brewhouse.  The food looks fantastic, and the beer is done well.
